text:
Oh, it's the next stage outfit.
Try it on later.

...Hmm?
Was there something strange about it?

I have a connection to the piano,
so it just felt a bit nostalgic.

I used to play it when I was younger,
so it brought back some memories.
I see... This time, the motif is the piano, right?

It has an elegant atmosphere, 
nd I think it suits you well, Mikoto.
